risks.title: Data Synchronization Conflicts (Offline-to-Online)
risks.impact: Data loss or duplication
risks.description: When user is offline and makes changes, then goes online, conflicts may occur between local and remote versions.
risks.rootCause: Multi-layer sync (UI → localStorage → React Query → Backend) without proper conflict resolution
mitigation: Add audit trail for all changes

risks.title: Multi-Tab Synchronization Out of Sync
risks.impact: User sees inconsistent data across browser tabs
risks.description: User makes change in Tab A, Tab B still shows old data. Creates confusion and potential duplicate operations.
risks.rootCause: BroadcastChannel not properly implemented or tabs don't refresh React Query cache
indicators: Changes in one tab don't appear in another
React Query cache stale in inactive tabs
mitigation: Add timestamp validation to prevent stale updates
Implement React Query invalidation on broadcast
Add visual indicator of sync status

risks.title: Financial Calculation Errors (Complex Formulas)
risks.impact: Incorrect revenue projections, settlement disputes, lost trust
risks.description: Finance module has complex logic: multi-currency, WHT, commissions, costs. One error cascades to all reports.
risks.rootCause: Ambiguous business rules, insufficient testing, rounding errors accumulate
indicators: User reports numbers don't match Excel
mitigation: Implement pure functions in FinanceCalc namespace

risks.title: Performance Degradation with Large Datasets (1000+ shows)
risks.impact: UI freezes, users can't work, bad experience
risks.description: Frontend calculates finance on 2000 shows, virtual lists with 10k items, filters, sorts - all blocking main thread.
risks.rootCause: No Web Workers, O(n²) algorithms, inefficient React re-renders
mitigation: Implement Web Workers for heavy computations

risks.title: Web Worker Race Condition (Main Thread Modification)
risks.impact: Incorrect finance calculations, stale data
risks.description: Worker receives shows data, begins calculation. Main thread modifies shows array. Worker uses stale data.
risks.rootCause: Not using deep clone when sending data to Worker
indicators: User edits show while calculation running
mitigation: Add timestamps to invalidate stale results

risks.title: Scope Creep - Features Accumulate, Timeline Slips
risks.impact: Project delays, team burnout, missed deadlines
risks.description: Stakeholders keep adding features. 'Can we add this?' becomes 'Must have'. Scope grows unbounded.
risks.rootCause: No clear MVP definition, no feature flags, no saying 'no'
mitigation: Use feature flags to deploy without features

risks.title: Backend API Not Ready When Frontend Needs It
risks.impact: Frontend blocked, can't test real scenarios, delays
risks.description: Backend development lags. Frontend can't integrate with real API, stuck with mocks.
risks.rootCause: Backend and frontend work in silos, unclear API contract upfront
mitigation: Use mock API (MSW) for frontend development

risks.title: localStorage Corruption (Unrecoverable Data Loss)
risks.impact: All user data lost locally
risks.description: localStorage becomes corrupted (browser bug, extension interference, quota exceeded). User can't recover shows.
risks.rootCause: No validation of stored data, no backup strategy
mitigation: Validate stored data on load (JSON schema)
Use IndexedDB as secondary backup (if implemented)
Migrate to localStorage only after backend ready
Add data recovery UI (reload from server)

risks.title: Authentication Token Leaks / Security Breach
risks.impact: Attacker gains access to user account and data
risks.description: JWT tokens stored insecurely, not refreshed properly, exposed in logs or Network tab.
risks.rootCause: Storing token in localStorage (vulnerable to XSS), no token rotation, no HTTPS
indicators: Old tokens still valid after logout
mitigation: Use httpOnly cookies for token storage
Add rate limiting on auth endpoints

risks.title: i18n Translations Incomplete or Wrong
risks.impact: Poor user experience in non-English languages
risks.description: Only EN + ES partially done. FR, DE, IT, PT missing or incorrect (broken grammar, wrong context).
risks.rootCause: No translation review process, automated translations not validated
mitigation: Hire native speakers for FR, DE, IT, PT

risks.title: Component Tests Never Get Re-enabled (30 tests skipped)
risks.impact: Component behavior not tested, regressions slip through
risks.description: Component tests skipped due to provider setup issues. Never get fixed because not critical.
risks.rootCause: Test infrastructure complex, low priority when core tests pass
mitigation: Create AllTheProviders wrapper in test utils
Make skipped tests visible in CI

risks.title: E2E Tests Not Setup (Mock API Missing)
risks.impact: Real user flows not tested, bugs reach production
risks.description: E2E tests for auth flow, shows CRUD, finance not implemented because API doesn't exist.
risks.rootCause: Mock Service Worker (MSW) not configured
mitigation: Run in CI on every PR

risks.title: Database Not Optimized (Slow Queries)
risks.impact: API response times > 1s, poor user experience
risks.description: FASE 6 backend queries not indexed. Queries on large datasets become slow.
risks.rootCause: Lack of database optimization, missing indexes
indicators: EXPLAIN ANALYZE shows full table scans
mitigation: Add indexes to frequently queried fields (user_id, status, date)

risks.title: Deployment Pipeline Fails (CI/CD Breaks)
risks.impact: Can't deploy, stuck with broken code
risks.description: CI/CD pipeline not configured. Manual deployment error-prone.
risks.rootCause: No GitHub Actions / Jenkins setup

risks.title: Offline Operation Queue Gets Lost on Crash
risks.impact: User loses unsaved changes
risks.description: Browser crashes while offline. offlineManager queue is in memory, not persisted.
risks.rootCause: Queue stored in memory, no localStorage backup
mitigation: Add confirmation before closing if queue not empty

risks.title: Action Hub AI Scoring Algorithm Flawed
risks.impact: Wrong actions prioritized, user ignores ActionHub
risks.description: ActionHub priority scoring may not reflect actual user needs. Top action isn't most important.
risks.rootCause: Algorithm not validated against real user behavior
mitigation: Collect metrics on which actions users click

risks.title: Travel API Integration Fails (Amadeus)
risks.impact: Flight search doesn't work
risks.description: Amadeus API changes, credentials expire, rate limit exceeded.
risks.rootCause: Third-party API dependency
mitigation: Implement fallback to Google Flights search

risks.title: Real-Time Sync Gets Out of Sync
risks.impact: Real-time updates don't work, users see stale data
risks.description: WebSocket connection drops. Client doesn't reconnect. Misses server updates.
risks.rootCause: WebSocket not implemented, no reconnection logic
mitigation: Fall back to polling if WebSocket fails

risks.title: User Gets Locked Out (Auth Token Issues)
risks.impact: User can't access app
risks.description: Refresh token expires. User stuck without way to log back in.
risks.rootCause: Token expiry not handled, refresh logic buggy
mitigation: Show 'session expired' dialog with login link

risks.title: Mobile Responsiveness Breaks at Certain Sizes
risks.impact: App unusable on mobile, bad experience
risks.description: Responsive design not tested on all devices. Breaks on iPad, Android tablets.
risks.rootCause: Limited device testing
mitigation: Test on real devices (not just Chrome DevTools)
Use responsive design framework (Tailwind already done)

risks.title: Accessibility WCAG 2.1 AA Not Maintained
risks.impact: Disabled users can't use app, legal liability
risks.description: New features added without a11y audit. Screen reader broken. Keyboard nav not working.
risks.rootCause: a11y not enforced in code review
mitigation: Run axe DevTools on every page

risks.title: Team Member Burnout (Long Hours, High Pressure)
risks.impact: People quit, quality suffers, project delayed
risks.description: Aggressive timeline, scope creep, on-call support required.
risks.rootCause: Unrealistic deadlines, lack of planning

risks.title: Third-Party Library Update Breaks App
risks.impact: App breaks, must fix quickly
risks.description: React, Vite, Tailwind update. Breaking changes force code refactor.
risks.rootCause: Major version updates, not tested before upgrading
mitigation: Test minor updates in dev first
Review breaking changes before major upgrade

risks.title: Browser Compatibility Issues (Older Browsers)
risks.impact: App doesn't work on older browsers (IE11, etc)
risks.description: Some users on outdated browsers can't use features.
risks.rootCause: Not testing on older browsers, using modern JS/CSS
indicators: Features not working on older Safari
mitigation: Support latest 2 versions of major browsers
Use polyfills if targeting older browsers

risks.title: API Rate Limiting Not Enforced
risks.impact: Bot attacks, DDoS, server overwhelmed
risks.description: No rate limiting on API endpoints. Attacker can make unlimited requests.
risks.rootCause: Not implemented in FASE 6 planning
mitigation: Implement rate limiting (e.g., 100 req/min per IP)
Use Redis for distributed rate limiting
Monitor and alert on unusual traffic

risks.title: Backup Strategy Not Implemented
risks.impact: Data loss unrecoverable
risks.description: No database backups. If production DB crashes, all data lost.
risks.rootCause: Not planned in FASE 6

risks.title: Monitoring & Alerting Not Setup
risks.impact: Issues in production not caught early
risks.description: App crashes in production. No one knows until users complain.
risks.rootCause: No error tracking, logging, or monitoring

risks.title: Documentation Goes Out of Date (Becomes Useless)
risks.impact: Documentation misleading, developers confused
risks.description: API changes. Documentation not updated. Developers follow old instructions.
risks.rootCause: Documentation not versioned with code, not reviewed in PRs
mitigation: Keep docs in same repo as code
Link from code to docs (JSDoc comments)

nextSteps: 1. Assign owner to each CRITICAL risk
2. Create mitigation plan for each CRITICAL risk
3. Add trigger conditions for each risk
